welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Castleford, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. I hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a code to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all commercial flights and includes a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more personalized and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Robin Hood Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Robin Hood Airport handles freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
